thread.title_full: Chris Kyle American Sniper On Conan O'Brien Interview Video | The Daily Caller

author: dailycaller
title: Chris Kyle American Sniper On Conan O'Brien Interview Video
text:
4442223 A year before his death at the beginning of 2013, Chris Kyle appeared as a guest on Conan O’Brien’s late night talk show. As he was touring for his book “ American Sniper, ” Kyle talked about his tours overseas, and how his longest confirmed kill was a whopping 2,100 yards away.
“Which is 21 football fields away. I can’t even understand making a shot from that distance,” O’Brien joked.
WATCH:
